title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new entry for 1Password Service Account Token in secret scanning patterns.

Updated `hasValidityCheck` field for multiple providers (Anthropic, Bitrise, Contentful, Dropbox, Duffel, Dynatrace, redirect.pizza, WorkOS) to conditionally enable validity checks only on GitHub Enterprise Cloud (`ghec`), disabling them on Free/Pro/Team (`fpt`) and Enterprise Server (`ghes`).
Updated SHA references in `config.json` to reflect new data state.
summary:
- Added new entry for 1Password Service Account Token in secret scanning patterns.
- Updated `hasValidityCheck` field for multiple providers (Anthropic, Bitrise, Contentful, Dropbox, Duffel, Dynatrace, redirect.pizza, WorkOS) to conditionally enable validity checks only on GitHub Enterprise Cloud (`ghec`), disabling them on Free/Pro/Team (`fpt`) and Enterprise Server (`ghes`).
- Updated SHA references in `config.json` to reflect new data state.
generated_title: Add 1Password token and conditionally enable secret validity checks for GHEC
commits: **a089dcf**: Merge pull request #56953 from github/repo-sync (by docs-bot)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added new entry for 1Password Service Account Token in secret scanning patterns.
- Updated `hasValidityCheck` field for multiple providers (Anthropic, Bitrise, Contentful, Dropbox, Duffel, Dynatrace, redirect.pizza, WorkOS) to conditionally enable validity checks only on GitHub Enterprise Cloud (`ghec`), disabling them on Free/Pro/Team (`fpt`) and Enterprise Server (`ghes`).
- Updated SHA references in `config.json` to reflect new data state.

### Title
Add 1Password token and conditionally enable secret validity checks for GHEC
